targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  *
FROM stock_tickers
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  last(close, time) - first(open, time) as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (last(close, time) - first(open, time))*100/first(open, time) as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (last(volume, time) - first(volume, time)) as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (last(volume, time) - first(volume, time))*100/first(volume, time) as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  low,
  high,
  open,
  close
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  volume
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (close - open)*100/open as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (close - open)*100/open as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  (close - open)*100/open as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

-- SELECT time_bucket('7 days', time) AS week,
--   (last(close, time) - first(close, time))*100/first(close, time) as week_diff_pct 
-- FROM stock_prices
-- WHERE
--   $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock' GROUP BY week
-- ORDER BY 1

select time, (last(close, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING) - first(open, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING)) * 100/ first(open, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING) from stock_prices WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

-- SELECT time_bucket('7 days', time) AS week,
--   (last(close, time) - first(close, time))*100/first(close, time) as week_diff_pct 
-- FROM stock_prices
-- WHERE
--   $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock' GROUP BY week
-- ORDER BY 1

select time, (last(close, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING) - first(open, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING)) * 100/ first(open, time) OVER (ORDER BY time RANGE BETWEEN '7d' PRECEDING AND '0d' FOLLOWING) from stock_prices WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  (close - open)*100/open as diff
FROM stock_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) and ticker = '$stock'
ORDER BY 1
